traits.name: Terror Dive
entries: If the pterafolk is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target, and then hits that target with a melee weapon attack, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The pterafolk makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. Alternatively, it makes two melee attacks with its javelin.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
